articles.title: Rbi Slaps Fines On Axis Bank, Idbi Bank | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The Reserve Bank has imposed a monetary penalty of  ₹93 lakh on Axis Bank and  ₹90 lakh on IDBI Bank.

articles.title: Big Bull Rakesh Jhunjhunwala Picks Stake In This Bangalore-based Bank During Q4 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: As of March 2022, Jhunjhunwala increased his shareholding in Canara Bank to 35,597,400 equity shares or 1.96%. In the previous quarter (October to December 2021), Jhunjhunwala's holding in Canara stood at 29,097,400 equity shares or 1.6%.
